Class SyslogdHandler

java.lang.Object

          edu.mscd.cs.javaln.syslog.SyslogdHandler

public class SyslogdHandler
extends SyslogHandler

Send a message to syslogd listening to the UDP port (typically 514) on a host (typically localhost)

A constructor to specify both host and port

Parameters:
host - the host to send messages to, if null set to "localhost"
port - the port to send messages to, if 0 set to 514
